catchHighlight: A pentester's team workflow enhancer that's:

more.title: Voron ?
more.desc: Voron is a platform that allows service providers to test deployed defenses and processes to ensure the sustainability of the system, through the missions to infiltrate corporate networks which are provided by Voron.

more.title: Makes you trustworthy
more.desc: Voron ensures that the companies who will be tested had already authorized computer attacks on their information networks.

more.title: Generates neat reports
more.desc: Voron will provide a report detailing the findings and various vulnerabilities, while attesting that the rules of engagement are being followed.
